name: Shoot or Die (Open Source)
description:
It's an entry for Trijam#38 (3h game jam) hosted by Rocknight Studios - https://www.twitch.tv/rocknightstudios
I tried to hit some of the bonus points:
   1.  Use Godot Engine;
   2.  Design at least 3 levels;
   3.  Make it a local multiplayer;

Source - https://github.com/nezvers/Godot_3.1_Public_Examples
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb4-Y0E6mmwjtawcitIAzKQ
Twitter - https://twitter.com/NeZversStudio
